channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside the crypto industry’s Faustian bargain with President Trump
item.description: 29-year-old Bo Hines is leading crypto policy at the White House. But will economic volatility upend the sector’s progress?

item.title: Trump’s senior crypto advisor donated $1M in campaign advertisements to top Trump Super PAC one week before election
item.description: Bo Hines also served as the CEO of an “anti-woke,” Gen Z-focused digital news platform that partnered with a Trump-affiliated memecoin.

item.title: Chinese President Xi Jinping kickstarts his 3-nation Southeast Asia tour as Trump flip-flops on tariffs
item.description: Xi arrived in Vietnam on Monday, and will visit Malaysia and Cambodia later this week. His visit comes just days after Trump put a 90-day pause on rec...

item.title: Cutting complexity might be the new leadership superpower
item.description: CEOs are confronting complexity and organizational bloat. Here's how.

item.title: Donald Trump’s 29-year-old crypto guru lays out the president’s plans for regulating crypto and rolling back a Biden-era crackdown
item.description: Since his appointment, Bo Hines has become a mini-celebrity in the crypto world—with CEOs, billionaire investors, and lobbyists vying for face time.

item.title: Nasdaq set to lead Dow, S&P 500 higher on tech tariff pause amid mixed signals
Here’s what could bring U.S. markets back from the brink
Citi cuts U.S. stocks to neutral, saying they're still too expensive
U.S. equity futures rise after electronics tariff exemptions, Apple, Nvidia gain
Ray Dalio says Trump’s trade war could spark ‘something worse than a recession’
